alert.note: Alert for Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 10:22PM CDT until May 07 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK...SOUTHEASTERN HENDERSON...SOUTHWESTERN WARREN AND NORTHWESTERN MCDONOUGH COUNTIES... At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Raritan, or 15 miles southeast of Burlington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Raritan around 1025 PM CDT. Media and Smithshire around 1030 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
